XUENN DIGITAL GAMING INNOVATORS DESCRIPT:
We are a technology provider of leading edge, dynamic and innovative solutions in the Digital Gaming Space.
Being in the business for more than a decade and with offices in Taiwan, Philipines, Indonesia & UK, we continue to challenge status quo to deliver business values to our partners cross markets in Asia and Europe.
We are a technology provider of leading edge, dynamic and innovative solutions in the Digital Gaming Space.
VISION DESCRIPTION: Leading ourselves and partners to the ultimate level of digital gaming experience.
MISSION DESCRIPTION: To provide world class digital gaming solutions through innovation.
GOAL DESCRIPTION: To be recognized as Digital Gaming Innovators.
SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT DESCRIPTION: The Software Development team designs, architects, and develops platforms and applications for companies.
QUALITY CHANGE CONTROL DESCRIPTION: The Quality & Change Control team at Xuenn prides itself on its perfectionism. We won’t settle for anything less than delivering the best product to our customers.
APPLICATION SUPPORT DESCRIPTION: Our Application Support team delivers the most trustworthy, dependable, and innovative 24/7 services to our community of global customers.
THE NEW FRONTIER DESCRIPTION: We embrace the Digital Age through the use of Innovation
SERVICE EXCELLENCE DESCRIPTION: Our services do not end with the launch of the business and entertainment solutions, we also provide comprehensive after-sales support to the specific needs of our clients.
SERVICE EXCELLENCE SUBTITLE: Service with a strong success and visible benefits
DELIVERY SUBTITLE: Design to be Omni Channel ready.
DELIVERY DESCRIPTION: Our scalable business and entertainment solutions for both web and mobile platforms and built using state-of-the-art technology. We always aim for the end-product that exceeds the expectation of our clients.
INNOVATION SUBTITLE: Making business successful in a changing world
INNOVATION DESCRIPTION: We continually venturing to build more exciting and challenging solutions to further extend our services and to add value to our clients.
SOLUTIONS AND SERVICES DESCRIPTION 1: Our leading solutions are supported by a range of extensive services.
SOLUTIONS AND SERVICES DESCRIPTION 2: Our business and entertainment solutions support Omni Channels and are built using state-of-the-art technology.
SOLUTIONS AND SERVICES DESCRIPTION 3: We focus in delivering in accordance to the requirements spelt out by our business partners and exceed their expectations through Service Excellence both a pre-implementation and Post implementation perspective.
SOLUTIONS AND SERVICES DESCRIPTION 4: We believe in establishing such strong partnerships can enable our Partner's business grow exponential in providing World Class entertainment products to their members.
LET US CONNECT SUBTITLE: We look forward to hearing from you.

YOUR CAREER AT XUENN SUBTITLE: A Community of Digital Gaming Innovators
YOUR CAREER AT XUENN DESCRIPTION 1: Innovators enjoy and take pride in their work. They are passionate, focused and know how to have fun. We want nothing less for the Innovators that join our team.
YOUR CAREER AT XUENN DESCRIPTION 2: At Xuenn, we subscribe to the belief that all our Innnovatiors should be given the opportunity to succeed. No matter where you see yourself in this Digital Age in our company, we want to help you get there.
YOUR CAREER AT XUENN DESCRIPTION 3: We provide a conducive work environment that has career mobility opportunities across different countries that we are in (Taiwan, Philipines, Indonesia and Unitied Kingdom)
